1: וְהָיָה֩ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כִֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>shall be when</n> יָבֹ֨אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>are come</n> עָלֶ֜יךָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <sup>1697 </sup> <n>And it shall come to pass when all these things</n> הָאֵ֗לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>of these</n> הַבְּרָכָה֙ <sup>1293 </sup> <n>upon thee the blessing</n> וְהַקְּלָלָ֔ה <sup>7045 </sup> <n>and the curse</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> נָתַ֖תִּי <sup>5414 </sup> <n>which I have set</n> לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> וַהֲשֵׁבֹתָ֙ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>thee and thou shalt call</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> לְבָבֶ֔ךָ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>[them] to mind</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>among all the nations</n> אֲשֶׁ֧ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> הִדִּיחֲךָ֛ <sup>5080 </sup> <n>hath driven</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>whither the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> שָֽׁמָּה׃ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>and you</n>
2: וְשַׁבְתָּ֞ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>And shalt return</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> יְהוָ֤ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> וְשָׁמַעְתָּ֣ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>and shalt obey</n> בְקֹל֔וֹ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>his voice</n> כְּכֹ֛ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>that</n> אָנֹכִ֥י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> מְצַוְּךָ֖ <sup>6680 </sup> <n>according to all that I command</n> הַיּ֑וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>thee this day</n> אַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> וּבָנֶ֔יךָ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>thou and thy children</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to all</n> לְבָבְךָ֖ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>with all thine heart</n> וּבְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>and with all thy soul</n>
3: וְשָׁ֨ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>will turn</n> יְהוָ֧ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>That then the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁבוּתְךָ֖ <sup>7622 </sup> <n>thy captivity</n> וְרִחֲמֶ֑ךָ <sup>7355 </sup> <n>and have compassion</n> וְשָׁ֗ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>upon thee and will return</n> וְקִבֶּצְךָ֙ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>and gather</n> מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>thee from all the nations</n> אֲשֶׁ֧ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> הֱפִֽיצְךָ֛ <sup>6327 </sup> <n>hath scattered</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>whither the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> שָֽׁמָּה׃ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n>
4: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> יִהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> נִֽדַּחֲךָ֖ <sup>5080 </sup> <n>If [any] of thine be driven out</n> בִּקְצֵ֣ה <sup>7097 </sup> <n>unto the outmost</n> הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>[parts] of heaven</n> מִשָּׁ֗ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> יְקַבֶּצְךָ֙ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>gather</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>from thence will the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> וּמִשָּׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> יִקָּחֶֽךָ׃ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>thee and from thence will he fetch</n>
5: וֶהֱבִֽיאֲךָ֞ <sup>935 </sup> <n>will bring</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>into</n> הָאָ֛רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>thee into the land</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יָרְשׁ֥וּ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>possessed</n> אֲבֹתֶ֖יךָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>which thy fathers</n> וִֽירִשְׁתָּ֑הּ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>and thou shalt possess</n> וְהֵיטִֽבְךָ֥ <sup>3190 </sup> <n>it and he will do thee good</n> וְהִרְבְּךָ֖ <sup>7235 </sup> <n>and multiply</n> מֵאֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>1 </sup> <n>thee above thy fathers</n>
6: וּמָ֨ל <sup>4135 </sup> <n>will circumcise</n> יְהוָ֧ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> לְבָבְךָ֖ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>thine heart</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> לְבַ֣ב <sup>3824 </sup> <n>and the heart</n> זַרְעֶ֑ךָ <sup>2233 </sup> <n>of thy seed</n> לְאַהֲבָ֞ה <sup>157 </sup> <n>to love</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֧ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> לְבָבְךָ֥ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>with all thine heart</n> וּבְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>and with all thy soul</n> לְמַ֥עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>so</n> חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>that thou mayest live</n>
7: וְנָתַן֙ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>will put</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> אֵ֥ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָאָל֖וֹת <sup>423 </sup> <n>all these curses</n> הָאֵ֑לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> אֹיְבֶ֥יךָ <sup>341 </sup> <n>upon thine enemies</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> שֹׂנְאֶ֖יךָ <sup>8130 </sup> <n>and on them that hate</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> רְדָפֽוּךָ׃ <sup>7291 </sup> <n>thee which persecuted</n>
8: וְאַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>and you</n> תָשׁ֔וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>And thou shalt return</n> וְשָׁמַעְתָּ֖ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>and obey</n> בְּק֣וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>the voice</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וְעָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and do</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מִצְוֹתָ֔יו <sup>4687 </sup> <n>all his commandments</n> אֲשֶׁ֛ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אָנֹכִ֥י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> מְצַוְּךָ֖ <sup>6680 </sup> <n>which I command</n> הַיּֽוֹם׃ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>thee this day</n>
9: וְהוֹתִֽירְךָ֩ <sup>3498 </sup> <n>will make thee plenteous</n> יְהוָ֨ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> בְּכֹ֣ל ׀ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <sup>4639 </sup> <n>in every work</n> יָדֶ֗ךָ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of thine hand</n> בִּפְרִ֨י <sup>6529 </sup> <n>in the fruit</n> בִטְנְךָ֜ <sup>990 </sup> <n>of thy body</n> וּבִפְרִ֧י <sup>6529 </sup> <n>and in the fruit</n> בְהֶמְתְּךָ֛ <sup>929 </sup> <n>of thy cattle</n> וּבִפְרִ֥י <sup>6529 </sup> <n>and in the fruit</n> אַדְמָתְךָ֖ <sup>127 </sup> <n>of thy land</n> לְטוֹבָ֑ה <sup>2896 </sup> <n>for good</n> כִּ֣י ׀ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יָשׁ֣וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>will again</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>for the LORD</n> לָשׂ֤וּשׂ <sup>7797 </sup> <n>rejoice</n> עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> לְט֔וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>over thee for good</n> כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>he</n> שָׂ֖שׂ <sup>7797 </sup> <n>as he rejoiced</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> אֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>1 </sup> <n>over thy fathers</n>
10: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>if</n> תִשְׁמַ֗ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>If thou shalt hearken</n> בְּקוֹל֙ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>unto the voice</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> לִשְׁמֹ֤ר <sup>8104 </sup> <n>to keep</n> מִצְוֹתָיו֙ <sup>4687 </sup> <n>his commandments</n> וְחֻקֹּתָ֔יו <sup>2708 </sup> <n>and his statutes</n> הַכְּתוּבָ֕ה <sup>3789 </sup> <n>which are written</n> בְּסֵ֥פֶר <sup>5612 </sup> <n>in this book</n> הַתּוֹרָ֖ה <sup>8451 </sup> <n>of the law</n> הַזֶּ֑ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>if</n> תָשׁוּב֙ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>[and] if thou turn</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> לְבָבְךָ֖ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>with all thine heart</n> וּבְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>and with all thy soul</n> פ
11: כִּ֚י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הַמִּצְוָ֣ה <sup>4687 </sup> <n>For this commandment</n> הַזֹּ֔את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> אֲשֶׁ֛ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אָנֹכִ֥י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> מְצַוְּךָ֖ <sup>6680 </sup> <n>which I command</n> הַיּ֑וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>thee this day</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> נִפְלֵ֥את <sup>6381 </sup> <n>it [is] not hidden</n> הִוא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> מִמְּךָ֔ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>too</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> רְחֹקָ֖ה <sup>7350 </sup> <n>from thee neither [is] it far off</n> הִֽוא׃ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n>
12: לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> בַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>It [is] not in heaven</n> הִ֑וא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>you should</n> לֵאמֹ֗ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>that thou shouldest say</n> מִ֣י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> יַעֲלֶה־ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>Who shall go up</n> לָּ֤נוּ הַשָּׁמַ֙יְמָה֙ <sup>8064 </sup> <n>for us to heaven</n> וְיִקָּחֶ֣הָ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and bring</n> לָּ֔נוּ וְיַשְׁמִעֵ֥נוּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>it unto us that we may hear</n> אֹתָ֖הּ <sup>853 </sup> וְנַעֲשֶֽׂנָּה׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>it and do</n>
13: וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> מֵעֵ֥בֶר <sup>5676 </sup> <n>Neither [is] it beyond</n> לַיָּ֖ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>the sea</n> הִ֑וא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>you should</n> לֵאמֹ֗ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>that thou shouldest say</n> מִ֣י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> יַעֲבָר־ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>Who shall go</n> לָ֜נוּ אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> עֵ֤בֶר <sup>5676 </sup> <n>over</n> הַיָּם֙ <sup>3220 </sup> <n>the sea</n> וְיִקָּחֶ֣הָ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>for us and bring</n> לָּ֔נוּ וְיַשְׁמִעֵ֥נוּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>it unto us that we may hear</n> אֹתָ֖הּ <sup>853 </sup> וְנַעֲשֶֽׂנָּה׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>it and do</n>
14: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> קָר֥וֹב <sup>7138 </sup> <n>nigh</n> אֵלֶ֛יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>But</n> הַדָּבָ֖ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>But the word</n> מְאֹ֑ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>[is] very</n> בְּפִ֥יךָ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>unto thee in thy mouth</n> וּבִֽלְבָבְךָ֖ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>and in thy heart</n> לַעֲשֹׂתֽוֹ׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that thou mayest do</n> ס
15: רְאֵ֨ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>See</n> נָתַ֤תִּי <sup>5414 </sup> <n>I have set</n> לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> הַיּ֔וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>thee this day</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַֽחַיִּ֖ים <sup>2416 </sup> <n>life</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַטּ֑וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>and good</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמָּ֖וֶת <sup>4194 </sup> <n>and death</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָרָֽע׃ <sup>7451 </sup> <n>and evil</n>
16: אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> אָנֹכִ֣י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> מְצַוְּךָ֮ <sup>6680 </sup> <n>In that I command</n> הַיּוֹם֒ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>thee this day</n> לְאַהֲבָ֞ה <sup>157 </sup> <n>to love</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֤ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> לָלֶ֣כֶת <sup>1980 </sup> <n>to walk</n> בִּדְרָכָ֔יו <sup>1870 </sup> <n>in his ways</n> וְלִשְׁמֹ֛ר <sup>8104 </sup> <n>and to keep</n> מִצְוֹתָ֥יו <sup>4687 </sup> <n>his commandments</n> וְחֻקֹּתָ֖יו <sup>2708 </sup> <n>and his statutes</n> וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֑יו <sup>4941 </sup> <n>and his judgments</n> וְחָיִ֣יתָ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>that thou mayest live</n> וְרָבִ֔יתָ <sup>7235 </sup> <n>and multiply</n> וּבֵֽרַכְךָ֙ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>shall bless</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> בָּאָ֕רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>thee in the land</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> אַתָּ֥ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> בָא־ <sup>935 </sup> <n>whither thou goest</n> שָׁ֖מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n> לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>to possess</n>
17: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> יִפְנֶ֥ה <sup>6437 </sup> <n>turn away</n> לְבָבְךָ֖ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>But if thine heart</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and you will not</n> תִשְׁמָ֑ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>so that thou wilt not hear</n> וְנִדַּחְתָּ֗ <sup>5080 </sup> <n>but shalt be drawn away</n> וְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוִ֛יתָ <sup>7812 </sup> <n>and worship</n> לֵאלֹהִ֥ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>gods</n> אֲחֵרִ֖ים <sup>312 </sup> <n>other</n> וַעֲבַדְתָּֽם׃ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>and serve</n>
18: הִגַּ֤דְתִּי <sup>5046 </sup> <n>I denounce</n> לָכֶם֙ הַיּ֔וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>unto you this day</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אָבֹ֖ד <sup>6 </sup> <n>that ye shall surely</n> תֹּאבֵד֑וּן <sup>6 </sup> <n>perish</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>You will not</n> תַאֲרִיכֻ֤ן <sup>748 </sup> <n>[and that] ye shall not prolong</n> יָמִים֙ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[your] days</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <sup>127 </sup> <n>upon the land</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> אַתָּ֤ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> עֹבֵר֙ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>whither thou passest over</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <sup>3383 </sup> <n>Jordan</n> לָבֹ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>to go</n> שָׁ֖מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n> לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>to possess</n>
19: הַעִידֹ֨תִי <sup>5749 </sup> <n>to record</n> בָכֶ֣ם הַיּוֹם֮ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>this day</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>heaven</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאָרֶץ֒ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and earth</n> הַחַיִּ֤ים <sup>2416 </sup> <n>you life</n> וְהַמָּ֙וֶת֙ <sup>4194 </sup> <n>and death</n> נָתַ֣תִּי <sup>5414 </sup> <n>against you [that] I have set</n> לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> הַבְּרָכָ֖ה <sup>1293 </sup> <n>blessing</n> וְהַקְּלָלָ֑ה <sup>7045 </sup> <n>and cursing</n> וּבָֽחַרְתָּ֙ <sup>977 </sup> <n>therefore choose</n> בַּֽחַיִּ֔ים <sup>2416 </sup> <n>life</n> לְמַ֥עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>order</n> תִּחְיֶ֖ה <sup>2421 </sup> <n>may live</n> אַתָּ֥ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> וְזַרְעֶֽךָ׃ <sup>2233 </sup> <n>that both thou and thy seed</n>
20: לְאַֽהֲבָה֙ <sup>157 </sup> <n>That thou mayest love</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> לִשְׁמֹ֥עַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>[and] that thou mayest obey</n> בְּקֹל֖וֹ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>his voice</n> וּלְדָבְקָה־ <sup>1692 </sup> <n>and that thou mayest cleave</n> ב֑וֹ כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> ה֤וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>this</n> חַיֶּ֙יךָ֙ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>unto him for he [is] thy life</n> וְאֹ֣רֶךְ <sup>753 </sup> <n>and the length</n> יָמֶ֔יךָ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>of thy days</n> לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <sup>3427 </sup> <n>that thou mayest dwell</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> הָאֲדָמָ֗ה <sup>127 </sup> <n>in the land</n> אֲשֶׁר֩ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> נִשְׁבַּ֨ע <sup>7650 </sup> <n>sware</n> יְהוָ֧ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> לַאֲבֹתֶ֛יךָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>unto thy fathers</n> לְאַבְרָהָ֛ם <sup>85 </sup> <n>to Abraham</n> לְיִצְחָ֥ק <sup>3327 </sup> <n>to Isaac</n> וּֽלְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>and to Jacob</n> לָתֵ֥ת <sup>5414 </sup> <n>to give</n> לָהֶֽם׃ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> פ
